newsitem.title: UK: P&U to take 10 to 16 cents/shr charge.
newsitem.headline: P&U to take 10 to 16 cents/shr charge.

text.p: Pharmacia & Upjohn Inc said on Tuesday it would take a one-off charge of between $0.10 and $0.16 per share after tax against third-quarter earnings, to cover costs related to the planned merger of Pharmacia Biotech with Amersham International Plc's Life Science business.

The company said it expected to incur a number of charges including the write-off of some acquired research and development costs linked to the creation of Amersham Pharmacia Biotech, in which it will have a 45 percent stake.
